Q1

```{r}
library(readr)
data <- read_csv("grades.csv")
```


```{r}
library(tidyr)
library(dplyr)
total_num <- data %>%
  select(4:23) %>%
  summarise(n= sum(!is.na(.))) %>%
  pull(n)

print(paste("There are", total_num, "grades"))
```


```{r}
stud_n <- data |> distinct(Id) |> summarise(n = n())
print(paste('There are', stud_n, 'students.'))
```


```{r}
students <- data %>% select(Id, Group) %>% distinct() 
students |>
  slice_tail(n = 5) |>
  knitr::kable()
```
